teststorydesc: After document vaccinations for Tyler Owen Banks the clinician, Lily Jackson (ID 456) recognizes that an error was made during data entry for the Hepatitis A vaccine. The Lot Number was entered incorrectly. She updates the data in the EHR and transmits it to the IIS.
preCondition: The IZ-AD-5.1_Send_V04_Z22 test step has been successfully completed.
testObjectives: Support for sending an update request.
